MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 10-NOV-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: Further to a powercut  in the CW10 postcode area of Middlewich on 7th November our engineers carried out further investigations on the network and located an underground cable fault on the corner of Yew Tree Close. It will be necessary for the electricity supply to be turned off for customer in Beechfield Drive, Yewtree Close, Laurel Close and Chestnut Close from 10am to 3pm today for the engineers to carrying out a permanent repair safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:55am on 10th November 2020.
